ModMetaData.name: Harmony Optimizer
ModMetaData.description:
Caching vanilla GenTypes and harmony AccessTools.TypeByName for better game load speed.
Load order: -Harmony -Prepatcher(if you use) -**Harmony Optimizer** -Core -Other mods
issues: https://github.com/bananasss00/RW-HarmonyOptimizer/issues
ModMetaData.author: PirateBY
